title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Split

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan to be a semi-knit sweater that's comfortable and not itchy, with a deep hot pink color and good length. They appreciate its style, with one customer noting it pairs well with dresses, and another mentioning it sits nicely on the shoulders. The softness and fit receive positive feedback, though opinions about sizing are mixed, with some finding it true to size while others note it's not ove

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hot pink long cardigan sweater
items.body: This is a great long cardigan sweater. It’s TTS. Love the color with cream leggings and cream boots . It’s so pretty! Love the length. Perfect at 5’6”. It’s not too heavy. It’s soft and looks well made. Can’t wait to wear it! Bought a hot pink beret to wear with it. Great price! Will keep me warm. Read more
items.author: Talker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater to wear with anything
items.body: This is a cute sweater - l wasn't sure which sweater to get & ordered 2... I ended up keeping both! It's great with jeans or a dress, washes well. I hung it to dry for awhile, then finished drying in the dryer on low & it's held up just fine. Shipped quickly. Read more
items.author: debbey

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and warm for the price
items.body: Cute and warm! I do wish the sleeves were a little longer since I'm on the taller side, I prefer sleeves past my wrist. I had to stretch the sleeves a bit. The fabric isn't supremely soft but decent enough and is not itchy at all which is all I can ask for being that I'm buying clothes off Amazon. Washes and dries on low setting well without shrinking much. Read more
items.author: ppeas

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and cozy! Beige looks yellow IMO
items.body: Comfortable and good fit. 5’4” 130# I ordered a medium for a slightly more oversized fit. It was warm and cozy and soft. Unfortunately the beige color I ordered was more yellow than beige in my opinion and I didn’t like the color. My tank in the photo is stark white, hair is blonde, and the hat is yellow straw. So you can see the “beige” sweater I purchased is rather yellow in tone. That’s my only complaint. I plan to purchase the same item in a different color instead. Read more
items.author: D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works.
items.body: I would have liked it to be a bit thicker. From looking at the model that was my impression. However, after I steamed it , no it didn't get thicker lol but it looks nice. So I kept it. I did size up. I like something like this to be loose and flowing. I chose the Grey because to me, it wears like a better quality item. I wore black leggings and a black stretchy mock neck blouse, and black ankle boots with a little thin line of crystals where the boot and the heel meet , my diamond stud earrings , my ring and out I went. Lots and lots of compliments . Worth the price. Again, steam NOT IRON. It makes a difference . You dont want to smoosh the knit . Jus sayin Read more
items.author: ThatKat

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Would not buy again
items.body: Doesn’t hold up very well after several washes. Material gets fuzzy even when not putting it through the dryer. Cute and true to size. Read more
items.author: Katie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable
items.body: Love the color. True to size, light weight Read more
items.author: Celia

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars runs small
items.body: runs very small! XL is more like a small medium Read more
items.author: Matthew Cruse

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Split is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Dark Khaki, Olive Green, Dark Grey, Hot Pink, Black, Camel, Orange, Khaki, White, Beige, Purple, Light Pink, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
